[`func AudioOutputUnitStart(AudioUnit) -> OSStatus`](/documentation/audiotoolbox/audiooutputunitstart(_:))Starts an I/O audio unit, which in turn starts the audio unit processing graph that it is connected to.[`func AudioOutputUnitStop(AudioUnit) -> OSStatus`](/documentation/audiotoolbox/audiooutputunitstop(_:))Stops an I/O audio unit, which in turn stops the audio unit processing graph that it is connected to.[`typealias AudioOutputUnitStartProc`](/documentation/audiotoolbox/audiooutputunitstartproc)
